title: Ticket #3263: man directory not being built
description:
I am working on creating a personal condor on SL6 and there is condor_install script in release_dir. When I run 

  ./condor_install --make-personal-condor

I get: 

Missing release directories (looking in /scratch/username/CONDOR_SRC/release_dir):
  man
Unable to find some release directories.
  Please specify the correct location of these with --install=<path to release directories> or make sure it's in the current directory

I spoke with Alan and he said that making the directory man in the release_dir directory should be sufficient to move forward and it is. Why it doesn't create the man pages, I do not know.
creator: samf
